entry.title: Blong
entry.summary: I am happy to announce the release of Blong 2024, codename Ambrym.
entry.content:
I am happy to announce the release of Blong 2024, codename Ambrym.

This framework is the result of many years of efforts around producing reusable software. Its is descendant of the UnderTree frameworks, whose roots started as a Delphi application.

Many of the ideas of the UnderTree framework were pioneered during my numerous trips to the amazing country Vanuatu.

The name of the framework "blong" comes from Bislama, the official language of Vanuatu.

Ambrym is a volcanic island in the archipelago of Vanuatu.
